title: Roses are Red, Violets are Blue: 60+ Sweet, Silly & Savage Poems

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I am the walrus, coo coo cachoo.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I am the walrus, coo coo cachoo.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, the world was not prepared for the masterpiece: Shrek 2.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, the world was not prepared for the masterpiece: Shrek 2.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Do you want a hug? SIKE, no thank you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Do you want a hug? SIKE, no thank you.

steps.title: Roses are red, grass is green. Who needs love, when you have memes.
steps.content: Roses are red, grass is green. Who needs love, when you have memes.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’m Liam Neeson, and I will find you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’m Liam Neeson, and I will find you.

steps.title: Roses are red. When rum and coke mix, you go from a 3… to a solid 6.
steps.content: Roses are red. When rum and coke mix, you go from a 3… to a solid 6.

steps.title: Roses are red. Here’s something new: violets are violet, not freaking blue.[1] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red. Here’s something new: violets are violet, not freaking blue. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, pickles are sour. “I'll be ready in a minute.” More like an hour.
steps.content: Roses are red, pickles are sour. “I'll be ready in a minute.” More like an hour.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Leo’s girlfriend will be 25, when he’s 82.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Leo’s girlfriend will be 25, when he’s 82.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, lilies are white, this is not a poem, only flower facts.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, lilies are white, this is not a poem, only flower facts.

steps.title: Roses are red, I have a phone. Nobody calls me, forever alone.
steps.content: Roses are red, I have a phone. Nobody calls me, forever alone.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I watch too many crime shows, they’ll never find you.[2] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I watch too many crime shows, they’ll never find you. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. If you don’t like Harry Potter jokes, something’s Siriusly Ron with you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. If you don’t like Harry Potter jokes, something’s Siriusly Ron with you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, some poems rhyme, this one doesn’t.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, some poems rhyme, this one doesn’t.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. The last time you farted, it ended WWII.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. The last time you farted, it ended WWII.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Purple: Am I a joke to you?
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Purple: Am I a joke to you?

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. When I listen to music, my neighbors do too.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. When I listen to music, my neighbors do too.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’m eating right now because I have nothing to do.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’m eating right now because I have nothing to do.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. If I were you, I’d fall for me too.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. If I were you, I’d fall for me too.

steps.title: Roses are red, I am going to bed.[3] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red, I am going to bed. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red. My name isn’t Bruce. This poem makes no sense. Poodle juice.
steps.content: Roses are red. My name isn’t Bruce. This poem makes no sense. Poodle juice.

steps.title: Roses are red. I burnt my burrito. I’m sad and alone. Alexa, play Despacito.
steps.content: Roses are red. I burnt my burrito. I’m sad and alone. Alexa, play Despacito.

steps.title: Roses are red. Are you Shrek’s wife? Shrek is love. Shrek is life.
steps.content: Roses are red. Are you Shrek’s wife? Shrek is love. Shrek is life.

steps.title: Roses are red. I want to cry. Please bake me a giant apple pie (and brownies, cookies, muffins, cake….)
steps.content: Roses are red. I want to cry. Please bake me a giant apple pie (and brownies, cookies, muffins, cake….)

steps.title: Roses are red, you’re looking great. Have I seen you here before? This must be fate.
steps.content: Roses are red, you’re looking great. Have I seen you here before? This must be fate.

steps.title: Roses are red, I like how you think, you’re absolutely stunning, let me buy you a drink.
steps.content: Roses are red, I like how you think, you’re absolutely stunning, let me buy you a drink.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are violet. Here is my number, why don’t you dial it?[4] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are violet. Here is my number, why don’t you dial it? [4] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, let’s turn my dinner for one, into dinner for two.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, let’s turn my dinner for one, into dinner for two.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. How would you like it, if I came home with you?
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. How would you like it, if I came home with you?

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, is it hot in here? Or, is it just you?[5] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, is it hot in here? Or, is it just you? [5] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I want to order pizza, and watch Netflix with you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I want to order pizza, and watch Netflix with you.

steps.title: Roses are red, you’re extremely pretty. I was trying to think of another line, but I’m not very witty.
steps.content: Roses are red, you’re extremely pretty. I was trying to think of another line, but I’m not very witty.

steps.title: Roses are red, the earth is wide, you would look much prettier, with me by your side.
steps.content: Roses are red, the earth is wide, you would look much prettier, with me by your side.

steps.title: Roses are red, you’re so great. Pickup lines are overrated, let me take you out on a date.
steps.content: Roses are red, you’re so great. Pickup lines are overrated, let me take you out on a date.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’ve never seen anyone as sexy as you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’ve never seen anyone as sexy as you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I could go for a beer, how about you?[6] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I could go for a beer, how about you? [6] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’d give up my WiFi, to spend time with you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I’d give up my WiFi, to spend time with you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, I hate poetry, but I’m into you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, I hate poetry, but I’m into you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Want to get away next weekend, just me and you?
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Want to get away next weekend, just me and you?

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Nah, I’m not 14, I’m the 1 4 U.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Nah, I’m not 14, I’m the 1 4 U.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. You should give me a shot, of being your boo.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. You should give me a shot, of being your boo.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. You make the world better, by just being you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. You make the world better, by just being you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. It’s only been one day, but I really miss you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. It’s only been one day, but I really miss you.

steps.title: Roses are red. My face is too. That only happens when I’m around you.[7] X Research source
steps.content: Roses are red. My face is too. That only happens when I’m around you. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. da Vinci painted Mona, cause he couldn't find you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. da Vinci painted Mona, cause he couldn't find you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I had a great day, I hope you did too.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I had a great day, I hope you did too.

steps.title: R4 is red, R2 is blue, if I were the force, I would be with you.[8] X Research source
steps.content: R4 is red, R2 is blue, if I were the force, I would be with you. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’ve never met anyone as beautiful as you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’ve never met anyone as beautiful as you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue, this winter is shrinking everything, except my feelings for you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue, this winter is shrinking everything, except my feelings for you.

steps.title: Charmanders are red. Squirrels are blue. If you were a Pokémon, I’d choose you.
steps.content: Charmanders are red. Squirrels are blue. If you were a Pokémon, I’d choose you.

steps.title: Roses are red. Mosquitos bite. You deserve someone who will treat you right.
steps.content: Roses are red. Mosquitos bite. You deserve someone who will treat you right.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. How can I be as amazing as you?
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. How can I be as amazing as you?

steps.title: Roses are red. Violets are blue. Close your eyes. I want to kiss you.
steps.content: Roses are red. Violets are blue. Close your eyes. I want to kiss you.

steps.title: Roses are red. Netflix is red. Have you looked outside recently? Let’s stay in bed.
steps.content: Roses are red. Netflix is red. Have you looked outside recently? Let’s stay in bed.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I feel so blessed to know someone like you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I feel so blessed to know someone like you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. Even if there wasn’t gravity on Earth, I’d still fall for you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. Even if there wasn’t gravity on Earth, I’d still fall for you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. But who needs flowers? When I’ve got you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. But who needs flowers? When I’ve got you.

steps.title: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’ve never met anyone as caring as you.
steps.content: Roses are red, violets are blue. I’ve never met anyone as caring as you.
